MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Session.PlaybackStateCode StateBuffering = (6)

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.Session.PlaybackStateCode enum directly instead of this field.", true)]
